{{stub}}
'''TolkCast''' is a German-language podcast produced by the [[German Tolkien Society]]. The first episode aired on [[22 September]] [[2018]], making it the oldest Tolkien-related German podcast.<ref>https://www.tolkcast.de/ (accessed 18 June 2023)</ref> It is co-hosted by Annika Röttinger, Tobias M. Eckrich, Jonas Reinhard, Johny, and Marie-Noelle. Since October [[2020]], two episodes per month are released. 
==Interview episodes==
* [https://www.tolkcast.de/episode/008-wir-jagen-lieber-betten-in-die-luft Episode 8]: 2019 Leipzig Bookfair special episode, contains a short interview with [[John Howe]]
* [https://www.tolkcast.de/episode/017-das-interview-mit-dimitra-fimi-shaun-gunnar Episode 17:]: Interview with [[Dimitra Fimi]] and [[Shaun Gunner]] (separately)
* [https://www.tolkcast.de/episode/018-das-interview-mit-tom-shippey Episode 18]: Interview and talk ''"Tolkiens Erben"'' by [[Tom Shippey]] at the [[2019]] [[Tolkien Thing]] (both in German)
* [https://www.tolkcast.de/episode/027-das-interview-mit-brian-sibley Episode 27]: Interview with [[Brian Sibley]]
* [https://www.tolkcast.de/episode/033-das-interview-mit-john-garth Episode 33]: Interview with [[John Garth]]
* [https://www.tolkcast.de/episode/038-das-interview-mit-scull-hammond Episode 38]: Interview with [[Wayne Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]]
* [https://www.tolkcast.de/episode/047-das-interview-mit-ted-nasmith Episode 47]: Interview with [[Ted Nasmith]]
* [https://www.tolkcast.de/episode/091-das-interview-mit-lisa-kuppler Episode 91]: German interview with [[Lisa Kuppler]] (Translator of [[The Annotated Hobbit]])
* [https://www.tolkcast.de/episode/113-interview-mit-brian-sibley Episode 113]: Interview with [[Brian Sibley]]
* [https://www.tolkcast.de/episode/127-interview-mit-catherine-mcilwaine Episode 127]: Interview with [[Catherine McIlwaine]]
* [https://www.tolkcast.de/episode/129-interview-mit-sarah-schaefer-bill-fliss Episode 129]: Interview with [[Sarah Schaefer]] and [[Bill Fliss]] (Tolkien archivist at [[Marquette University]]), curators of [[J.R.R. Tolkien: The Art of the Manuscript]]

==External links==
* [https://www.tolkcast.de/ '''Official website''']
